TestCase.CaseDescription: Inserting user with non-existing role Expected error: Can not add due to referential integrity
TestCase.SQLScript: insert into Users (userId, email, firstname, lastname, password, roleId, majorId) values ('64015c46-6724-11e5-b364-0a184912e379', 'role@test.com', 'test', 'test', PASSWORD('123abcd'), 4, 2);
